Package de.lessvoid.nifty.render.batch.core

Class CoreRender

java.lang.Object
de.lessvoid.nifty.render.batch.core.CoreRender
public class CoreRender extends Object
Simple helper methods to render vertex arrays. Note: Requires OpenGL 3.2 or greater.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    renderPoints(CoreGL gl, int count)
    Renders the currently active VAO using points with the specified number of vertices.
    static void
    renderPointsInstances(CoreGL gl, int count, int primCount)
    Renders the currently active VAO using points with the specified number of vertices AND does that primCount times.

    Renders the currently active VAO using triangle fan with the specified number of vertices.

    • renderTriangleStrip

      public static void renderTriangleStrip(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int count)
      Renders the currently active VAO using triangle strips with the specified number of vertices.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of vertices to render as triangle strips.

    • renderTriangleFan

      public static void renderTriangleFan(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int count)
      Renders the currently active VAO using triangle fan with the specified number of vertices.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of vertices to render as a triangle fan.

    • renderTriangleStripInstances

      public static void renderTriangleStripInstances(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int count, int primCount)
      Renders the currently active VAO using triangle strips with the specified number of vertices AND does that primCount times.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of vertices to render as triangle strips per primitive.
      primCount - The number of primitives to render.

    • renderTriangleStripIndexed

      public static void renderTriangleStripIndexed(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int count)
      Renders the currently active VAO using triangle strips, sending the specified number of indices.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of indices to render as triangle strips.

    • renderTriangleFanIndexed

      public static void renderTriangleFanIndexed(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int count)
      Renders the currently active VAO using triangle fans, sending the specified number of indices.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of indices to render as triangle fans.

    • renderTriangles

      public static void renderTriangles(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int vertexCount)
      Renders the currently active VAO using triangles with the specified number of vertices.
      Parameters:
      vertexCount - The number of vertices to render as triangle strips.

    • renderTrianglesIndexed

      public static void renderTrianglesIndexed(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int count)
      Renders the currently active VAO using triangles with the specified number of vertices.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of vertices to render as triangle strips.

    • renderPoints

      public static void renderPoints(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int count)
      Renders the currently active VAO using points with the specified number of vertices.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of vertices to render as points.

    • renderPointsInstances

      public static void renderPointsInstances(@Nonnull CoreGL gl, int count, int primCount)
      Renders the currently active VAO using points with the specified number of vertices AND does that primCount times.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of vertices to render as points per primitive.
      primCount - The number of primitives to render.
